## Problem / motivation
Describe the problem you're trying to solve, or the use case that motivated this request.

## Proposed solution
A clear and concise description of what you'd like to happen.

## Alternatives considered
Any alternative solutions or features you've considered, and why you prefer the proposed one.

## Additional context
Screenshots, mockups, or any other context that helps illustrate the request.
